skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from Sorath the Frost Spider.
skills.name: Groom Carapace

skills.desc:
Instantly transfers any [Decrease DEF] debuffs and [Weaken] debuffs placed on Sorath to this Spiderling if this Spiderling is not under a [Leech] debuff. 

Will convert 60% [Decrease DEF] debuffs to 30% and 25% [Weaken] debuffs to 15% when transferring.
skills.name: Tiny Martyrs [P]
